channel.title: Ringof wealth
channel.description: hey guys I need some help finding a 317 source with a working ring of wealth I can view the code so I can figure out how to code the ring of wealth in or if someone would take the time to find the code for me that would be really great I appreciate it thanks

item.title: Ringof wealth
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Assuming your drop system is like runescapes (ie drop tables, rare, normal, bad etc.) you can just up a tier if the player is wearing a ring of wealth when drawing for an item. Or you can increase the individual item drop rates if your system works like that. To find out if the player is wearing the ring you can do a simple if check on their ring slot and try to match the id with a ring of wealth.

Read full topic
